properties.description: ISO Alpha-3 Code

properties.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

properties.description: Max number of results to return

properties.name: options
properties.description: Company name to query on

options.name: fields
options.description: Comma-delimited list of Company properties to include in the response. (Fields such as notes, fax_number and custom_fields aren't included, by default.).

properties.description: Performs duplicate checking by one of the following options: Email, EmailAndName. If a match is found using the option provided, the existing contact will be updated.

properties.name: operation
properties.description: Create a record of an email sent to a contact
properties.action: Create a record of an email sent

options.name: Create Record
options.description: Create a record of an email sent to a contact
options.action: Create a record of an email sent

properties.name: additionalFields
properties.description: Base64 encoded HTML

options.name: originalProvider
options.description: Provider that sent the email case insensitive, must be in list

options.name: originalProviderId
options.description: Provider ID that sent the email, must be unique when combined with provider. If omitted a UUID without dashes is autogenerated for the record.

options.name: providerSourceId
options.default: The email address of the synced email account that generated this message.

properties.name: returnAll
properties.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

properties.name: limit
properties.description: Max number of results to return

properties.name: filters
properties.description: Emails sent since the provided date, must be present if untilDate is provided

options.name: sinceSentDate
options.description: Emails sent since the provided date, must be present if untilDate is provided

options.name: untilSentDate
options.description: Email sent until the provided date

properties.name: userId
properties.description: The infusionsoft user to send the email on behalf of. Choose from the list, or specify an ID using an expression.

properties.name: contactIds
properties.description: Contact IDs to receive the email. Multiple can be added seperated by comma.

properties.name: subject
properties.description: The subject line of the email

properties.name: additionalFields
properties.description: Email field of each Contact record to address the email to, such as 'EmailAddress1', 'EmailAddress2', 'EmailAddress3', defaulting to the contact's primary email

options.name: addressField
options.description: Email field of each Contact record to address the email to, such as 'EmailAddress1', 'EmailAddress2', 'EmailAddress3', defaulting to the contact's primary email

options.name: htmlContent
options.description: The HTML-formatted content of the email, encoded in Base64

options.name: plainContent
options.description: The plain-text content of the email, encoded in Base64

properties.name: attachmentsUi
properties.description: The content of the attachment, encoded in Base64

values.name: fileData
values.description: The content of the attachment, encoded in Base64

values.name: fileName
values.description: The filename of the attached file, including extension

values.name: property
values.description: Name of the binary properties which contain data which should be added to email as attachment

properties.name: binaryPropertyName

properties.description: The filename of the attached file, including extension

properties.name: fileData
properties.description: The content of the attachment, encoded in Base64

options.description: Filter files based on name, with '*' preceding or following to indicate LIKE queries

options.name: type
options.description: Filter based on the type of file

options.name: viewable
options.description: Include public or private files in response

hints.text: The name of the input binary field containing the file to be uploaded

notes.name: Notes
notes.description: Optional note to save with the node

notesInFlow.name: Display Note in Flow?
notesInFlow.description: If active, the note above will display in the flow as a subtitle

alwaysOutputData.name: Always Output Data
alwaysOutputData.description: If active, will output a single, empty item when the output would have been empty. Use to prevent the workflow finishing on this node

executeOnce.name: Execute Once
executeOnce.description: If active, the node executes only once, with data from the first item it receives

retryOnFail.name: Retry On Fail
retryOnFail.description: If active, the node tries to execute again when it fails

maxTries.name: Max. Tries
maxTries.description: Number of times to attempt to execute the node before failing the execution

waitBetweenTries.name: Wait Between Tries (ms)
waitBetweenTries.description: How long to wait between each attempt (in milliseconds)

onError.name: On Error
onError.description: Action to take when the node execution fails

options.name: Continue
options.description: Pass error message as item in regular output

options.name: Continue (using error output)
options.description: Pass item to an extra `error` output

settings.note: Executable nodes have both common and executable settings
